articles.description: India qualified for the Asia Cup 2023 final by beating Sri Lanka, who will be up against Pakistan in the next match hoping to seal the second spot in the title-decider.
articles.content: India's nervy yet convincing victory over Sri Lanka in their second Super 4 match of the Asia Cup 2023 on Wednesday earned them the ticket to the final. After a complete performance against Pakistan,… [+1848 chars]
